interfaceDescription: Object passed as parameter in the column GridColDef cell renderer.

api.description: GridApi that let you manipulate the grid.

colDef.description: The column of the row that the current cell belongs to.

field.description: The column field of the cell that triggered the event.

hasFocus.description: If true, the cell is the active element.

row.description: The row model of the row that the current cell belongs to.

rowNode.description: The node of the row that the current cell belongs to.

formattedValue.description: The cell value formatted with the column valueFormatter.

isEditable.description: If true, the cell is editable.

value.description:
The cell value.
If the column has valueGetter, use params.row to directly access the fields.
